title: Question about Dynamic for Rito
body:
So basically currently i am unranked, however last year i ended gold (gold 4 preseason) and i am currently 5/0 in provisionals.

My question is, why is the invite recommendation to invite people who are in bronze?

Is it based on your friend's list and you would just be unable to invite the players if you try?

Or is it just because i am still doing my provisionals?
